tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE biodegradable_waste_disposal_patterns (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  location VARCHAR(255),
  waste_type VARCHAR(100),
  disposal_method VARCHAR(100),
  disposal_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE Biodegradable_Waste_Disposal_Patterns (
    user_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    disposal_date DATE,
    disposal_location VARCHAR,
    waste_type VARCHAR,
    disposal_amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE WasteAnalysis ( 
 analysis_id UUID PRIMARY KEY, 
 waste_type TEXT, 
 analysis_date DATE, 
 analysis_result TEXT, 
 location_name TEXT REFERENCES DisposalLocation(location_name) 
 );
